name: General Community
description: Versatile community server with social channels, events, media sharing, voice hangouts, and moderation tools.

channels.name: rules
channels.topic: ğŸ“œ Community rules and guidelines

embed.title: ğŸ“œ Community Rules
embed.description: Please follow these rules to keep our community welcoming for everyone!

fields.name: 1. Be Kind & Respectful
fields.value: Treat everyone with dignity. No bullying, harassment, or hate speech of any kind.

fields.name: 2. Keep It Clean
fields.value: No NSFW content. This is an all-ages community.

fields.name: 3. No Spam
fields.value: No spam, excessive tagging, or unsolicited DMs to members.

fields.name: 4. Right Channel, Right Content
fields.value: Post in the appropriate channel. Off-topic has its own home!

fields.name: 5. No Advertising
fields.value: No self-promo or ads without permission. Share in #self-promo if relevant.

fields.name: 6. Listen to Staff
fields.value: Staff decisions are final. Appeal via DM if you disagree.

fields.name: 7. Privacy Matters
fields.value: Don't share others' personal info. Respect boundaries.

fields.name: 8. Common Sense
fields.value: If you wouldn't say it to someone's face, don't type it here.

embed.footer: Violations may result in warnings, mutes, or bans. Have fun! ğŸ‰
